医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示新冠肺炎后脑膜炎明显复发巴斯德研究所的一组科学家利用国家脑膜炎球菌参考中心的数据库追踪了 2015 年至 2022 年间法国侵袭性脑膜炎球菌疾病病例的演变，发现在 2015 年放松控制措施后，该病出现了前所未有的死灰复燃。 COVID-19 疫情。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Study-reveals-significant-post-COVID-meningitis-resurgence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Study-reveals-significant-post-COVID-meningitis-resurgence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e52e5a8d-745a-460a-9aae-6e7c56c5be06 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 23:16:33 -0500 Study reveals significant post-COVID meningitis resurgence
微量营养素缺乏与肠道微生物组变化和抗生素耐药性有关不列颠哥伦比亚大学的研究人员发现了微量营养素缺乏与生命早期肠道微生物群组成之间的惊人联系，这可能有助于解释为什么全球范围内抗生素耐药性不断上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Micro Nutrition-deficicies-linked-to-gut-microbiome-shifts-and-antibiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Micro Nutrition-deficiency-linked-to-gut-microbiome-shifts-and-antibiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c7d976c-362f-41bc-8b29-e95fafacf1c2 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 23:11:43 -0500 Micronutrient deficiencies linked to gut microbiome shifts and antibiotic resistance
简单的肥皂溶液可能会改变对抗疟疾的游戏规则长达数十年的抗击疟疾之战的解决方案能否像肥皂一样简单？在《公共科学图书馆被忽视的热带病》上发表的一项新研究中，德克萨斯大学埃尔帕索分校的科学家对此提出了令人信服的理由。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Simple-soap-solution-could-be-a-game-changer-in-the-fight-against-malaria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Simple-soap-solution-could-be-a-game-changer-in-the-fight-against-malaria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef464691-ec5e-4ed3-bc94-6569a7133019 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 22:15:17 -0500 Simple soap solution could be a game-changer in the fight against malaria
研究发现纳米塑料与帕金森病和痴呆症有关纳米塑料与大脑中天然存在的特定蛋白质相互作用，产生与帕金森病和某些类型的痴呆症相关的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Study-links-nano Plastics-to-Parkinsons-disease-and-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Study-links-nano Plastics-to-Parkinsons-disease-and-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40aab3ae-adbc-4cfd-a99a-0a734ceca3e8 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 21:54:40 -0500 Study links nanoplastics to Parkinson's disease and dementia
对肺癌细胞“记忆”的新理解提出了新的治疗方法纪念斯隆凯特琳癌症中心 (MSK) 的研究人员发现，对肺癌细胞“记忆”的新认识提出了一种改善治疗的新策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/New-understanding-of-lung-cancer-cells-memories-suggests-novel-treatment-approach.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/New-understanding-of-lung-cancer-cells-memories-suggests-novel-treatment-approach.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6b6269f-be58-4413-88b9-cfe86f97327a Fri, 17 Nov 2023 21:28:25 -0500 New understanding of lung cancer cells' 'memories' suggests novel treatment approach
研究人员发现了一种有前途的青光眼细胞替代疗法新策略青光眼是全球失明的主要原因之一，而由于视网膜神经节细胞 (RGC) 损失而导致的视力丧失目前无法通过任何治疗来逆转。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Researchers-identify-a-promising-new-strategy-for-glaucoma-cell-replacement-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Researchers-identify-a-promising-new-strategy-for-glaucoma-cell-replacement-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed67f152-0b12-4d22-b34b-5a010c2d201b Fri, 17 Nov 2023 20:56:54 -0500 Researchers identify a promising new strategy for glaucoma cell replacement therapy
RIT 科学家荣获 NIH 奖，以支持构建下一代药物的研究罗彻斯特理工学院化学与材料科学学院助理教授埃米利亚诺·布里尼 (Emiliano Brini) 获得了美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 颁发的奖项，以支持他构建下一代药物的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/RIT-scientist-earns-NIH-award-to-support-research-on-building-the-next- Generation-of-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/RIT-scientist-earns-NIH-award-to-support-research-on-building-the-next- Generation-of-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8ec833b-d6ea-4077-b586-04740ef013de Fri, 17 Nov 2023 20:30:18 -0500 RIT scientist earns NIH award to support research on building the next generation of drugs
揭示免疫系统对纳米颗粒药物输送的反应为了减少与化疗相关的副作用，研究人员研究了可以将更多药物直接输送到肿瘤的输送系统的使用。得克萨斯理工大学健康科学中心 (TTUHSC) 杰里 H. 霍奇药学院免疫治疗和生物技术系的 Ninh (Irene) La-Beck 药学博士就是其中一位研究人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Unraveling-the-immune-systems-response-to-nanoarticle-drug-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Unraveling-the-immune-systems-response-to-nanoarticle-drug-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0616bd2-612d-4479-b7a6-de78533d0a07 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 20:21:44 -0500 Unraveling the immune system's response to nanoparticle drug delivery
评估 DDX53 作为潜在的早期食管癌抗原2023 年 11 月 10 日，Oncoscience（第 10 卷）发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“癌症睾丸抗原 DDX53 作为潜在的早期食管癌抗原的免疫信息学评估”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Assessing-DDX53-as-a-潜在-early-esophageal-cancer-antigen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Assessing-DDX53-as-a-潜在-early-esophageal-cancer-antigen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b3b819c-ed06-4fd3-8c83-5e94b42960db Fri, 17 Nov 2023 20:15:46 -0500 Assessing DDX53 as a potential early esophageal cancer antigen
新的社会保障报告显示日益严重的超额支付问题超过 $23B社会保障管理局本周发布的一份新财务报告显示，该机构的多付问题范围持续扩大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/New-Social-Security-report-shows-having-over payment-problem-tops-2423B.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/New-Social-Security-report-shows-having-over payment-problem-tops-2423B.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98a7e7fe-38bd-4e39-8f48-267c64b11c20 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 20:07:18 -0500 New Social Security report shows growing overpayment problem tops $23B
